alert.note: Alert for Giles; Lawrence; Wayne (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 09 at 6:34PM CST until December 09 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Wayne County in Middle Tennessee... Central Lawrence County in Middle Tennessee... Northern Giles County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 700 PM CST. * At 634 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Loretto, or 11 miles southwest of Lawrenceburg, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lawrenceburg, Pulaski, Loretto, Ethridge, Leoma, and Westpoint. This includes Interstate 65 near mile marker 19. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for Middle Tennessee. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for Middle Tennessee.
